response:
"wie kann man noch immerdar darüber sprechen, dass unternehmen und regierungen unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden? haben wir nicht das recht auf informationsfreiheit? oder ist das nur ein mythos? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "how can we still talk about companies and governments collecting and using our personal data? don't we have the right to freedom of information? or is that just a myth? #dataprotection #privacy"

this post critically examines the topic of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions the extent to which companies and governments have the right to collect and use personal data, and whether individuals have a right to freedom of information that supersedes this. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to categorize the post and make it easily searchable by others interested in the topic.
